I really wish I was around for the evolution of this franchise, and the progression of people you saw and met while playing. It's enjoyable as it's own, but I think I'd prefer modding around with it next time I play.

best game ever (played it on a diffrent account)

This game is the first game I ever saw at my uncle. I saw this game before sudoku XD .I couldn’t control it but time is the key. I practiced and I learned to play better. Fun fact, I meet a NiP player in a death match and he 1v1 me. He beat me.... I started training with him and learned got better. The CSGO game is much much easier cuz of the recoil patterns the helpful features but there are many things that the grandpa 1.6 had and CS GO has a trashy community. I managed to reach global elite very easy . I am serious when I say I like more CS1.6. I spent mouths in game and I still play but certainly the game is nearly dead :((

Como nâo gostar? Estou recomendando este jogo desde 2009 e vou continuar recomendando até que todos possam joga-ló. Você acha que drogas viciam? Ha!, entâo voce nunca jogou Counter-Strike.. Prepare-se para passar raiva, afliçâo, bullying e muito mais, tudo bem.. existem os famosos 'cheaters', mas nâo se preocupe com isso.. existem diversos servidores que só permitem a entrada de jogadores steam, entâo ter um hacker atrapalhando seu jogo nâo será mais uma possibilidade. Nas promoçoês da steam, esse jogo chega a custar 5$ BRL, nada que juntar aquela grana do lanche nâo compre.
